content.rendered:
April showers bring May flowers, and it certainly did on May 3 when Lauren and David said "I do" on the beautiful rooftop patio at The Bridge Building.

Their spring wedding was in full bloom with touches of navy and metallics to complement the beautiful floral centerpieces from Belles Fleurs Designs.

Following a traditional jewish ceremony on the rooftop, dinner was served. Guests enjoyed slow-roasted prime rib and chicken scallopini alongside balsamic marinated vegetables and rosemary roasted new potatoes.

After dinner in the Cumberland space, guests returned to the rooftop patio to dance the night away under the stars.

For dessert, guests indulged in chocolate covered strawberries in addition to a beautiful four-tiered square cake from Dulce Desserts.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: May 3, 2014
Bride & Groom: Lauren and David
Location: The Bridge Building
Photographer: Matt Andrews
Florist: Belles Fleurs
Cake: Dulce Desserts
Band: The Entice Band
Rehearsal Dinner: The Harding House
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Production: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: IH

excerpt.rendered: A spring rooftop wedding at The Bridge Building Event Spaces.
